Author: atejeanelle
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP] - MOSAIC - Decentralized market intelligence network
Body: No denying that 2017 has boomed the cryptocurrency market, but cryptoasset investors makes an uninformed decision due to lack of research and information on cryptoassets, and at the same time, centralized research is inefficient, unscalable, and plagued by inherent biases and conflicts of interest.  Most cryptoasset purchasers invests without the proper information. The lack of reliable information leads to investment failure or missed opportunities. We desperately need a platform to give us, a clear, concise and reliable information that is transparent and unbiased.

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP] - MOSAIC - Decentralized market intelligence network
Body: What the crypto-world need has finally arrived! Check out this Reuters report!  https://www.reuters.com/article/us-crypto-currencies/mosaic-network-will-reward-researchers-with-its-own-cryptocurrency-idUSKCN1FY2VD/  No denying that 2017 has boomed the cryptocurrency market, but cryptoasset investors makes an uninformed decision due to lack of research and information on cryptoassets, and at the same time, centralized research is inefficient, unscalable, and plagued by inherent biases and conflicts of interest.  Mosaic project as a decentralized market intelligence network aims to solve this problem through a decentralized platform for reliable research, market information, and discussions on cryptoassets and related areas.  Mosaic delivers research and market data through a user-friendly appâ€” with data feeds, portfolio-tracking software, and community-engagement featuresâ€” and is powered by Mosaicâ€™s market intelligence protocol.  Vetted contributors (research analysts and ecosystem participants) post in-depth research reports, articles, market updates, discussion threads, comments, and data after rigorous research and discussions.  Participate in their project discussion here: https://t.me/mosaicnetwork

Author: Mosaic_Network
Title: [ANN][AIRDROP] - MOSAIC - Decentralized market intelligence network
Body: Mosaic Network Airdrop Airdrop Like it should be 100 Ether Worth of MZX Giveaway NOW UPDATED TO 200 ETHER WORTH OF MZX GIVEAWAY BY POPULAR DEMAND!!!  Are you tired of bounty campaigns posing as airdrops?   If yes, then welcome to the Mosaic Network Airdrop where airdrop is what airdrops should be!  We are happy to announce our Airdrop program officially to the users of BitcoinTalk.  About Mosaic Network:  In the wake of fraudulent and misleading token offerings and ICOs, Mosaic Network is formed by a highly professional and competent team, where the cryptocurrency projects will be reviewed and rated like never before. Mosaic Network is a Decentralized market intelligence network where researchers will do in-depth and unbiased review and rating. These reports can be accessed using the native token of the network MZX.  About the Airdrop:  This is an airdrop in the truest sense where you need to fill out a simple form to get your MZX Tokens.  REGISTRATION FORM:[ CLICK HERE ]             STATUS SHEET:[ CLICK HERE ]  For Any query related to the Airdrop please   [JOIN HERE]  Rules:  1 ) The Airdrop is available until the 200 ETH worth of MZX is used up. 2 ) You must stay a member of Mosaicâ€™s Social Media platforms indicated in the registration form until told otherwise to be eligible for the Airdrop.   3 ) Fill out the form using your true & correct details. 4 ) Using a bot is strictly forbidden. 5 ) Use your MEW wallet only. 6 ) Under no circumstances, a request to change your registered wallet id will be entertained. 7 ) Using any fraudulent technique to tilt the balance in your favour is strictly forbidden. You will be kicked out of the program with immediate effect. 8 ) Depending on how many (1-4) details you share on that form, your airdrop will also vary from 1x to 4x. Sharing at least one info, apart from the wallet id is compulsory. 9 )Bitcointalk members of every status are eligible for the airdrop. 10 ) Using duplicates is strictly forbidden. 11 ) Airdrop is not available for the citizens of  US, Canada, China, and South Korea.   The actual date of the token distribution will be shared during the token subscription process.  We strongly encourage you to share this with your friends! Don't they want some free tokens??  Know Our Project in more details: [Website] [Whitepaper] [Medium] [Facebook] [Twitter] [Telegram]

Title: [ANN][AIRDROP] - MOSAIC - Decentralized market intelligence network
